title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: Public Involvement
body: Public Involvement                     Public comment and involvement is integral to the future success of WWII Valor in the Pacific National Monument and all units of the National Park System. To ensure easy access to planning documents, the National Park Service created the Planning, Environment, and Public Comment system (PEPC).  Please visit PEPC to view any upcoming projects and proposals at VALR and leave us your useful comments.
